name: Kat Kress
coverLetter: Hello, I'm Kat, I have been working in the cannabis industry for 8 plus years ranging from Caretaking Medical Green house Grows in California to trim crews and budtending. I am currently the floor manager for a local dispensary in Portland,but I am looking to picking up some extra hours. I am open to part time currently and would LOVE the opportunity to use more of my cannabis related skills
